TopicTitle: Explain that to the insurance agency

Articles.Content:
It was a fireworks show for the surface base below.

A rocket is mounted on the pad sideways and launched, destroying the VAB.

I got Pitch = 0o confused with Altitude = 0o.

Your firstborn is recruited by the Mob and goes on to lead it in your name.

Umm... What is there to explain again?

After the launch clamps fail to disengage, your rocket rips them off of the pad.

Your warranty expired.

 

MechJeb no work

Blame Jeb, its his personality. Wait... What's that? Jeb is banned from insurance forever.

The phone you were using to call the insurance agency catches fire.

All this dialing builds up friction 

 

It was a perfect launch of the Eve Descent Vehicle... but your retro rocket pack was knocked off and the only way you can land is with solid backup motors

The retro rocket motors were actually a different mission hitching a ride.

The Juno ends up in Pluto orbit.

The probe targeting software thought that Pluto's angle was Jupiter's 

Suddenly the sky is full of falling space craft and space objects.

Free parts!

Your golden disk on your interstellar flyby probe was accidently filled with the dankest memes on the planet.

I was giving the aliens memes so we can pray to our god dat boi

I Fart on the rocketship

enjoy the smell

and then at some point they all started to take picture of themselves with cells phones and elses, they used to call and name that a selfie

It's a side effect of The Future. It can't be fixed.

The LHC control room is full of pigeons pooping on all the computers.

They are giving the PC's a bath

The rocket blows up the launchpad

A crew member spontaneously combusted and caused the fuel tanks to erupt.

Your satellite is destroyed by a comet while in LKO.

Edited July 13, 2016 by Vysionone

It must have been the Magic Bouldertm!

The worker responsible for supplies forgot to pack the snacks into the cabin compartments.

The worker was only responsible for rocket-building supplies.

Your MK3 SSTO gets stuck in the Vallhenge.

The Vallhenge wasn't here yesterday!

Your airliner hits a small plane and is destroyed

We were both flying IFR and obeyed ATC instructions, it's ATC's fault.

A house hit my car.
